sentences.en: A dog that is bb always has this pigmentation.
sentences.cn: 携带bb基因的小狗都会有色素沉着.

sentences.en: Bean sprout can prevent the formation of flecks and dark pigmentation and whiten the skin.
sentences.cn: 豆芽可以防止雀斑、黑斑,使皮肤变白.

sentences.en: Bleach: A preparation which lightens the hair by removing the pigmentation.
sentences.cn: 漂色: 一种去掉头发色素的使头发颜色变浅的准备工作.

sentences.en: Feet -- Catlike, pads hard, pigmentation harmonizing with nose and eye rims.
sentences.cn: 猫足,脚垫坚硬, 色素与鼻镜及眼圈协调一致.

sentences.en: Hair and fair complexion, no pigmentation, dull complexion or chlorosis.
sentences.cn: 皮肤白皙, 无色素沉着, 肤色萎黄或晦暗.

sentences.en: I have a skin disorder that destroys the pigmentation of my skin.
sentences.cn: 我有一种皮肤病变,这摧毁了我皮肤的色素沉著.

sentences.en: I have a skin disorder, it destroys the pigmentation in my skin.
sentences.cn: 我患有一种皮肤病，破坏了我的天然肤色。

sentences.en: In the recent 10 years, pigmentation of plastics industry develops rapidly.
sentences.cn: 塑料行业的着色近十多年发展迅速.

sentences.en: Nails strong, hard, pigmentation harmonizing with either nose and eye rims or coat.
sentences.cn: 趾甲坚硬结实, 坚硬, 色素与鼻镜、眼圈及被毛协调一致.

sentences.en: Perfectly whiten the blacker and all kind of pigmentation skin.
sentences.cn: 使较黑肤色和各类色素沉着的皮肤白皙完美,均匀靓丽.

sentences.en: The dark pigmentation gives protection from the sun’s rays.
sentences.cn: 这种天然的深色可避免阳光伤害。

sentences.en: The disease causes patches of pigmentation on the face.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病能引起面部色素斑沉着.

sentences.en: The doctor said permanent dermal pigmentation is a form of microsurgery.
sentences.cn: 医生说永久的皮肤染色是一种显微手术.

sentences.en: The skin irradiated was pigmentation after radiotherapy.
sentences.cn: 放疗后,患者受照射的皮肤部位均出现色素沉着.

sentences.en: The skin pigmentation of a person not classed as white.
sentences.cn: 除白种人外有色人种的肤色.

sentences.en: Under the current standard, a yellow with chocolate pigmentation is disqualified.
sentences.cn: 按照现行的标准, 带巧克力色沉着的黄拉拉是失格的.

words.tran_cn: 染色；色素淀积；天然颜色

trans.tran_en: the natural colour of living things
